content.line: I have the greatest fun at night,
When casement windows are all bright.
I make believe each one's a square
Of some great quilt up in the air.

line.figLang: The blocks of gold have black between

content.line: It surely makes a mammoth quilt —
With bits of dark and checks of gilt —

line.figLang: To cover up the tired day

content.line: In such a cozy sort of way.
